attributes.action: Bring in a job evaluation scheme that limits the minimum and maximum paid to people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nurses get paid peanuts footballers get paid millions. This is totally irrational with those who are contributing most getting paid least.
A job elaluation scheme where every job is evaluated, banded and then using some method (probably the income tax scheme) to cap pay to min £15,000 pa for 40 hrs and max £250000 pa for 40 hrs is needed.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
